title: NHSRC Recruitment 2026 - Apply Online for Senior Consultant Posts
description: The National Health Systems Resource Centre (NHSRC) has announced the latest job notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Senior Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, BAMS, BHMS, B.Sc Nursing, B.Pharm, B.Sc, Post Graduation, MD/ MS can grab this opportunity and apply for the NHSRC Recruitment 2026 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Int...
